title: 98/343/ECSC, Euratom: Commission Decision of 30 April 1998 concerning the conclusion on behalf of the European Coal and Steel Community and the European Atomic Energy Community of the Interim Agreement between the European Community, the European Coal and Steel Community and the European Atomic Energy Community, of the one part and the Republic of Uzbekistan of the other part on trade and trade-related matters
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 30 April 1998 concerning the conclusion on behalf of the European Coal and Steel Community and the European Atomic Energy Community of the Interim Agreement between the European Community, the European Coal and Steel Community and the European Atomic Energy Community, of the one part and the Republic of Uzbekistan of the other part on trade and trade-related matters (98/343/ECSC, Euratom)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Interim Agreement between the European Community, the European Coal and Steel Community and the European Atomic Energy Community, of the one part, and the Republic of Uzbekistan, of the other part, on trade and trade-related matters, together with the Protocol and the declarations hereby approved on behalf of the European Coal and Steel Community and the European Atomic Energy Community.
These texts are attached to this Decision (1).

The President of the Commission shall give the notification provided for in the Article 32 of the Interim Agreement on behalf of the European Coal and Steel Community and the European Atomic Energy Community.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 April 1998.
For the Commission
Hans VAN DEN BROEK
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 43, 14. 2. 1998, pp. 2 and 12.
